g++    --std=c++11 -Ofast -fopenmp -g   CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/Camera.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/Gridded.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/Image.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/Light.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/Noise.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/OIIOFiles.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/PerlinNoise.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/PyroclasticSphere.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/Stamp.C.o CMakeFiles/wedges.dir/src/wedges.C.o  -o wedges  -L/group/dpa/local/openvdb/lib -rdynamic -lHalf -ltbb -lopenvdb -lOpenImageIO -Wl,-rpath,/group/dpa/local/openvdb/lib
